meanings.definition: A person who is on vacation.
meanings.sent1: The vacationers enjoyed the sunny beach.
meanings.sent2: Many vacationers visit popular tourist destinations.
meanings.sent3: The vacationers were so relaxed they almost forgot their return flight.
meanings.sent4: The vacationers were like colorful birds flocking to a warm paradise.
meanings.sent5: The vacationers basked in the leisure of their time off.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of vacationers at the hotel.
meanings.sent2: The vacationers' laughter filled the resort.
meanings.sent3: The vacationers' suitcases were bursting with souvenirs.
meanings.sent4: The vacationers were a vibrant mix of different cultures.
meanings.sent5: The vacationers' excitement was contagious to everyone around.
